questions.quote: I guess we are just going to have to teach him to wear the ribbon!
What are we, John Dillinger? How did this get to be the crime of the century? It's not like we stuck a broomstick in her spokes and she went flying...
I remember he made you wear a jock on your head for a whole class. And the straps were hangin' down by his ,...
No, he doesn't know. See, I hid it without tellin' him. So, uh,  Phil won't be compulsively looking for it like some people... You!
I actually have a friend in the Immigration Department who owes me a big favor. You're very lucky.
Oh! Modelling! What's that like? Fun? Ha ha.  Stupid! Stupid! Stupid!
Hey, you owe me. I got you into Actor's Studio. They thought what we did was the scene.
Well, hem ,if you'll excuse me I think I'll just go to the ladies room.
Jerry I'm so glad we switched apartments. It was a perfect solution.
When you ask someone about their relationship and they touch their face, you know it's not going too well. Go ahead ask me how it's going with somebody.
